description: This file defines an Angular component called AccountsComponent that manages social media account connections. It displays connected accounts, allows disconnecting them, and enables connecting new accounts via platform-specific buttons. The component interacts with an API service to fetch, connect, and disconnect social accounts.

classes.name: AccountsComponent
classes.description: Angular component for managing social media account connections, displaying connected accounts, and providing interface to connect/disconnect accounts.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that triggers the initial load of social accounts.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Fetches the list of social accounts from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Initiates connection to a social platform, redirects to authentication URL if provided, or reloads accounts upon completion.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects a social account using its ID and refreshes the accounts list.

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^          const g = typeof globalThis !== 'undefined' ? (globalThis as any) : undefined;$/
